message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase a unique product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe the product's true value warrants a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it for $1,350,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value and my budget.
